channel.title: Brandon Maxwell on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Brandon Maxwell on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Scoop — the Iconic Boutique Revived by Brandon Maxwell and Walmart — Drops Fall 2025 Capsule
item.description: Born in NYC and relaunched as a private label, the Brandon Maxwell-led brand gets a fresh lineup of wallet-friendly barrel jeans, knee-high boots, barn jackets and east-west bags.
